text: Patrick Hooper (12 May 1952 â€“ 9 October 2020) was an Irish Olympian and long- distance runner. He was born in Dublin. He represented Ireland in the marathon at European and Olympic level.Pat Hooper at Sports Reference His marathon personal best time was 2:17:46. He participated in the 1980 Summer Olympics coming in 40th place. He was the older brother of three-time Olympian and marathoner Dick Hooper. Hooper died on 9 October 2020 in Dublin, aged 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Long- distance runners Category:Olympians for Ireland Category:Sportspeople from Dublin
title: Pat Hooper
